404.title: Please try again periodically. We are constantly working on fixing bugs
404.detail: Don't lose hope, try again soon. We are sorry for the error you received. We are constantly working to fix the errors. Please try again intermittently. This website is constantly tested and improved by hundreds of volunteer programmers. We won't give up. We are with you.

defaults.title: Error
defaults.detail: Technical error encountered, please try again.
